channel.title: Desperatly need help with shops(using allstar v2)
channel.description: i do the excat thing to amek a shop then when i run my server i egt this error - Allstar-Scape v1 - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 100" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29) wtf? and it wont let me log on i tlog on shows blk screen freezes please sum one help me

item.title: Desperatly need help with shops(using allstar v2)
item.dc:creator: @boma boma
item.description:
@boma wrote:

i do the excat thing to amek a shop then when i run my server i egt this error

  • Allstar-Scape v1 -
    … Online!
    Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "
    100"
    at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
    at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131)
    at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:31)
    at server.main(server.java:29)
    wtf? and it wont let me log on i tlog on shows blk screen freezes please sum one help me
